org.openscience.cdk.stereo

Class TetrahedralChirality

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.stereo.TetrahedralChirality
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, ICDKObject, IStereoElement, ITetrahedralChirality

    public class TetrahedralChirality
extends Object
implements ITetrahedralChirality
    Stereochemistry specification for quadrivalent atoms. See ITetrahedralChirality for further details.
    See Also:
    ITetrahedralChirality
    Belongs to CDK module:
    data
